sentence: Tomislav "Toma" Zdravković (Serbian Cyrillic: Томислав "Тома" Здравковић; 20 November 1938 – 30 September 1991) was a Yugoslav pop-folk singer-songwriter and recording artist of Serbian descent.
He had a characteristic baritone vocal, not too powerful but warm, resembling that of Charles Aznavour.
